=== Sub Teams ===
* Organized Sub Teams related to team administration and general tasks
* Set up of other teams to come as operation becomes smoother
==== Setup ====
* Wiki Maintenance Team
** Headed by ChrisRohde
** Responsible for editing and maintaining general wiki pages
** Making sure things stay current
* Meetings Team
** Headed by <nowiki>[[Pak33m]]</nowiki>
** Sets meeting times and dates (which will currently be first and third Sundays at 8 pm, subject to <nowiki>[[Pak33m]]</nowiki> Changing them)
** Sets agendas and ensures orderly meetings
** Conducts meetings
* Marketing Team
** Headed by MikeFeravolo
** Coordinates efforst with Ubuntu MarketingTeam and DIYMarketing
** Designs marketing materials
** Thinks up new and exciting ways to introduce Ubuntu to John Q. and Jane X. Public
* New User Education / Support
** Headed by MartinWilson
** Welcomes new users to team, introduces them to our resources
** Follows Launchpad for new additions to add to Roster
** More duties as the team grows
==== Future Plans for Sub Teams ====
* The teams currently set were to enable the LoCo to run more smoothly, as ChrisRohde just can't handle it all on his own anymore
* Soon there will be an "interests" page to let us know what people would like to work on
* New Sub Teams will develop from the interests and strengths of the team

=== Meet Up ===
* It is generally accepted that if we want the majority of the team to meet, it would have to be in the Tampa/Orlando area
* No definite plans were placed, but the interest was discussed
* Possibility of the meetup being in relation to Software Freedom Day
* MikeFeravolo has business space he could use for the meet up if it is in Orlando
